price: Odoo balbala samii irraa ta’e isaan irratti bannee, ishee keessa kan ol ba’an ta’anii;
arabic: وَلَوۡ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَابٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّواْ فِيهِ يَعۡرُجُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaw fataḥnā ʿalayhim bāban mina al-samāi faẓallū fīhi yaʿrujūna
